name: Adonai
description:
Adonai is a zen game about creating customized planets and populating your own Galaxy. There is no set objective, just relax and create as many planets and systems as you wish! There is a counter for the number of systems you've created, because who doesn't like to tick a number up?

[ESC] for controls and instructions, but hopefully everything is intuitive enough

Facet Starlight is a hobby studio composed of Sara and Joshua Hames, we work on video games in between our fulltime jobs, if you like what we do, the best form of support you can give us is to simply try our games and consider hiring Sara for your next project! She's a professionally educated 3D Artist with a swath of industry standard skills.
